cards.title: Greyhat
body: Dial Up
incapacitatedAbilities: One player may play a card.
One hero may use a power.
One player may draw a card.

cards.title: Coerced Uplink
body: Play this card next to a non-Hero target.
When this card enters play, {Greyhat} deals that target 2 Lightning Damage.

cards.title: Digital Uplink
body: Play this card next to a Hero other than {Greyhat}.
When this card enters play, that Hero may discard a card to use a power.

cards.title: Bandwidth Hub
body: Play this card next to {Greyhat}.
When this card enters play, {Greyhat} Regains 2 HP.
Reduce damage dealt to Heroes next to a Link by non-Hero Targets next to a Link by 1.

cards.title: Overclock Hub
body: Play this card next to {Greyhat}.
When this card enters play, {Greyhat} deals up to 3 Targets 1 Fire Damage.
Increase damage dealt by Heroes next to a Link to non-Hero Targets next to a Link by 1.

cards.title: Auto-Redirect Hub
body: Play this card next to {Greyhat}.
When this card enters play, you may destroy an Ongoing or Environment card.
The first time each turn a Hero next to a Link would be dealt 2 or fewer damage, you may redirect that damage to a non-Hero target next to a link.

cards.title: Deployed Relay
body: When this card enters play, you may draw a card.
At the end of your turn, you may search your Trash for a Link and put it into play.

cards.title: Proxy Pod
body: When this card enters play, you may draw a card.
At the end of your turn, this card regains 2 HP.

cards.title: Direct Control
body: You may play a link.
Each Hero next to a Link in their play area may use a power.
Each non-Hero Target next to a Link deals themselves 2 Melee Damage.

flavorQuotes.text: Stop... Oh, who am I kidding. Keep hitting yourself!

cards.title: Shock Therapy
body: You may play a link.
Each Hero next to a Link regains 2 HP.
{Greyhat} deals each non-Hero Target next to a Link deals 3 Lightning Damage.

flavorQuotes.text: You may feel a slight tingle.

cards.title: Data Transfer
body: You may play a link.
Each Player draws a card for each of their Heroes next to a link.
Draw a card for each non-Hero Target next to a Link.

cards.title: DDoS
body: You may play a link.
Each Hero next to a link deals each non-Hero Target next to a Link 1 Energy Damage.

cards.title: System Reboot
body: Search your deck or trash for a Link and put it in your hand.
Put any number of Links in play back in your hand.
You may play a number of Link cards equal to the number of Links returned to your hand by this card.

cards.title: Ping Sweep
body: Reveal cards from the top of your deck until 2 Links have been revealed. Play those Links. Shuffle the other revealed cards into your deck.

cards.title: Node Check
body: You may draw a card.
Search your deck for a Link and put it in your hand. Shuffle your deck.
You may play a card.

promoCards.title: Greyhat
body: Burst Noise
powers: {Greyhat} deals 1 Target 1 Sonic Damage. 1 Target next to a Link deals that Target 1 Sonic Damage.
incapacitatedAbilities: One player may play a card.
One hero may use a power.
One player may draw a card.

openingLines.default: Too much noise in the signal - time to clean it up.
